name: get_column_average
description: Retrieve the average value of a column in a table of a SQLite database, with optional WHERE and GROUP BY clauses.

database_path.description: The path to the SQLite database.

table_name.description: The name of the table to query.

column_name.description: The name of the column to calculate the average.

where_clause.description: The WHERE clause to filter rows, without the 'WHERE' keyword. Optional.

where_params.description: A list of parameters to bind to the WHERE clause. Optional.

oneOf.description: A single column name for the GROUP BY clause.
A list of column names for the GROUP BY clause.

group_by.description: The column(s) to group by, either a single column or a list of columns. Optional.
